channel.title: CVE Feed for stellar -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for stellar -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-32985|2024-08-02T02:27:53.266Z -- stellar -- stellar-core
item.description: Stellar-core is a reference implementation for the peer-to-peer agent that manages the Stellar network. Prior to 20.4.0, core nodes could be randomly crashed due to a race condition with a 3rd party library. The likelihood of affecting the network is low since crashed nodes come back up online right away. Code fix mitigation is part of Stellar-core v20.4.0 release
